infos.value: ...Phew. This lot is so pathetic, I've about lost interest!
Do not loosen your trigger finger, Frederika.
Well, even as I say that...
It's not as if these Sanctum monks pose any real threat against the might of «Solidus».
Alas... Sadali himself is said to be quite formidable.
With you and I working together, Darling, we're untouchable!
